refnamediv.refpurpose: Checks if attribute is a defined ID

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.description;
public boolDOMAttr::isId
This function checks if the attribute is a defined ID.
According to the DOM standard this requires a DTD which defines the attribute ID to be of type ID. You need to validate your document with
or DOMDocument::$validateOnParse before using this function.

&reftitle.returnvalues;
Returns &true; if this attribute is a defined ID, &false; otherwise.
